resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108314</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108314</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207006</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pulse of the Planet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Impuls des Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Impulsion de la planète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulso do planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impulso del pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφυγμός του πλανήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pulso del planeta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides a two-minute sound portrait of Planet Earth each weekday that is broadcast over 300 public and commercial stations around the world. This website includes an effort to learn about the ways people observe or celebrate the seasons of the year.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt ein Zweiminute Tonportrait von Planet Masse
jeder Wochentag zur Verfügung, der Sendung über 300 allgemein und 
kommerziellen Stationen um die Welt ist. Diese Web site 
schließt eine Bemühung ein, über die Methoden zu erlernen, die 
Leute die Jahreszeiten des Jahres beobachten oder feiern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit une verticale de bruit de deux-minute de 
la terre de planète chaque jour de la semaine qui est émission plus 
de 300 publics et stations commerciales autour du monde. Ce site
Web inclut un effort de se renseigner sur les voies que les gens 
observent ou célèbrent les saisons de l'année.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece um retrato do som de dois-minuto da terra 
do planeta cada weekday que é transmissão sobre 300 públicos e 
estações comerciais em torno do mundo. Este Web site inclui um
esforço aprender sobre as maneiras que os povos observam ou comemoram
as estações do ano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce un ritratto del suono di due-minuto 
della terra del pianeta ogni giorno della settimana che è 
radiodiffusione oltre 300 pubblici e le stazioni commerciali intorno 
al mondo. Questo Web site include uno sforzo imparare circa i 
modi che la gente osserva o che celebra le stagioni dell'anno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει ένα δύο-μικρό υγιές πορτρέτο της γης 
πλανητών κάθε εργάσιμη μέρα που είναι ραδιοφωνική μετάδοση άνω
των 300 δημόσιων και εμπορικών σταθμών σε όλο τον κόσμο. 
Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος περιλαμβάνει μια προσπάθεια να μάθει για 
τους ανθρώπους τρόπων παρατηρεί ή γιορτάζει τις εποχές του 
έτους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a un retrato del sonido del dos-minuto
de la tierra del planeta cada día laborable que sea difusión sobre 
300 públicos y estaciones comerciales alrededor del mundo. Este
Web site incluye un esfuerzo de aprender sobre las maneras que la 
gente observa o que celebra las estaciones del año.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207006</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108314</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/pulse-of-the-planet</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
